Title: Ernest Rides Again
Writer: John R. Cherry III, William M. Akers
Actors: Jim Varney, Ron James, Tom Butler, Linda Kash
Plot: Ernest P. Worrell becomes a new adventurer along with his History Professor partner, Abner Melon. Once they team up together, they discover a really huge existing historical cannon and the crown jewels hidden near the jungle. Ernest must save the jewels especially, before a lousy mob keeps it.
